TopicTitle: Modded KSP just freezes and closes when decouplers decouple

Articles.Content:
KSP: Latest - OS: Linux Mint

Problem: Game crashes when i decouple, no clue whats causing it, but its not an issue without mods,.

Mods installed:

Realistic Progression + Recommended CKAN Mods (.ckan file included with the logs)

Reproduction steps:

when i decouple the two decouplers my game just exits. I've included the log file,  save file and .ckan mod list for you all.

Log:
